ingredients.ingredient: 1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breasts, chopped
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry
1 (7.5 ounce) jar quartered artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 (6 ounce) package shredded Parmesan cheese, divided
4 large portobello mushroom caps, stems and gills removed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Remove mushroom gills with a spoon to create a deeper cavity for filling
Brown chopped chicken first, then mix with Alfredo before stuffing for better texture
Bake at 375°F for 25-30 minutes until mushrooms are tender and filling is bubbly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the purpose of removing the mushroom gills, and how does this affect the final dish?
